The Story

Bows, arrows, numbers. What do they all have in common? 

They stand at the cornerstone of our evolution. They mark the transition into humanness, the next stage in physical and mental skills, as they changed the course of history. 

But fast-forward into the present. I mean real fast.

Numbers are everywhere, they're in our pockets, in the light, in our radio waves. Primitive hunting tools have been replaced by autonomous machines and lasers.  

Have we forgotten how to hunt? Do we even remember how to count?

Keep this feeling with you when you go out on this experience, and don't be afraid to fail. It's hard, like everything today, but it will get easier, with perseverance.

The Guy

I'm always looking at ways to mix mediums. 

That's why I've always been interested in cinematography, making music, programming, and I want more.

 My road in game development and design is very young, but opens up a lot of colorful ways to mix those other things together and present them into something new.

The Ask

You can follow my progress on Facebook.

Feedback is very welcome. There's a lot more to do here, but I hope it's a start for a challenging experience as is. 

Please take time to get a feel for it, and then leave a rating in the Play Store as well. It's more than welcome and needed for a little game just coming out of its shell.

But most of all, have fun. 

Best,

Robert
